channel.title: Blog on Francisca Nel
channel.description: Recent content in Blog on Francisca Nel

item.title: Why did I actually choose Software Development?
item.description: In high school, I completely pursued the sciences because I was thinking of becoming a biomedical engineer. On the side, I took design as it was my passion - I loved drawing characters and I was excited about animation. In my first year, I took the computer science course out of the interest of potentially making games, and because I was familiarised with computers and wanted to get better. I found it challenging and dropped it in my second year.
